howToplay.title: Game Objective
steps: Werewolf team: Eliminate other players until the number of werewolves is equal to or greater than the remaining players.
Villager team and special roles: Identify and vote out all werewolves before getting eliminated.

howToplay.title: Game Setup
steps: Number of players: 6 or more (the more, the better).
Prepare role cards according to the number of players, including Werewolves, Villagers, and Special Roles.
Choose 1 Game Master (GM) who will control the game without participating as a player.

howToplay.title: Role Assignment
steps: Distribute role cards randomly to each player without revealing them to others.
Players must remember their roles and must not reveal them during the game.

howToplay.title: First Night Phase (Eyes Closed)
steps: GM asks everyone to close their eyes.
GM calls on the Werewolves to open their eyes and choose a victim.
GM calls on the Doctor to open their eyes and select one player to protect from being killed.
GM calls on the Seer to open their eyes and check one player’s role to see if they are a werewolf.
GM asks everyone to close their eyes again and remembers the choices made by each role.

howToplay.title: Day Phase
steps: GM announces who (if anyone) was killed during the night.
All players open their eyes and begin discussing, accusing, defending, and trying to identify the werewolves.
All players vote to eliminate one player from the game.
The eliminated player must reveal their role and leave the game immediately.

howToplay.title: Night–Day Cycle
steps: Return to the night phase: All players close their eyes and the special roles perform their actions.
In the morning, GM announces the results and starts the next discussion and voting round.
Repeat until a win condition is met.

howToplay.title: Winning Conditions
steps: Villagers win when all werewolves are eliminated.
Werewolves win when their number is equal to or greater than the remaining players.

howToplay.title: Suggested Special Roles (Optional for added fun)
steps: Doctor: Each night, selects one player to protect from being killed.
Seer: Each night, selects one player to check if they are a werewolf.
Hunter: If eliminated, can choose one player to die with them.
Lovers: If one dies, the other dies automatically.
Gunslinger: If voted out, can shoot and eliminate one player before leaving the game.

howToplay.title: Game Overview
steps: Players are divided into two teams: Mafia and Townspeople
The game alternates between Day and Night phases
The goal is to eliminate the opposing team

howToplay.title: Night Phase
steps: All players close their eyes
Mafia members silently choose a target to eliminate
Special roles may perform their night actions

howToplay.title: Day Phase
steps: Players discuss who they think is Mafia
Vote to eliminate a suspected Mafia member
The eliminated player reveals their role

howToplay.title: Setup
steps: Players receive loyalty cards (Good or Evil)
Evil players know each other's identities
Good players must work together without knowing who to trust

howToplay.title: Quest Selection
steps: The leader proposes a team for the current quest
All players vote to approve or reject the team
If approved, the quest begins

howToplay.title: Quest Resolution
steps: Team members secretly play Success or Fail cards
Good players must play Success
Evil players can play either card
Quest succeeds only if all cards are Success
